synopsis.text: Classics Club member Houtarou Oreki's lazy summer plans are disrupted when his globe-trotting sister enlists him as a lifeguard at the local pool. In this special episode of Hyouka, Oreki reunites with his fellow club members, who notice a puzzling disappearance at the pool. With Chitanda's curiosity ignited, it's up to Oreki and the rest of the Classics Club to unravel the enigmatic event and make the most of their day by the water. Join the group for a swim, a mystery, and a splash of fun in Hyouka: Motsubeki Mono wa.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
